contentList.content:
Umberlee is a vain and malicious deity who uses the harshness of the sea to exercise her power, drowning wayward ships without a moment's hesitation. She is most often worshiped by sailors and seafarers in a vain attempt to appease the petty god for safe passage.

Domains: Tempest
Alignment: Chaotic Evil

Umberlee is a vain and malicious deity who uses the harshness of the sea to exercise her power, drowning wayward ships without a moment's hesitation. She is most often worshiped by sailors and seafarers in a vain attempt to appease the petty god for safe passage.

Umberlee is a vain and malicious deity who uses the harshness of the sea to exercise her power, drowning wayward ships without a moment's hesitation. Umberlant paladins and other worshippers reflected their goddesses chaotic nature; the church was disorganized, hated, and spread out of fear instead of dogmatic principle.
